# Xml Axis Docs

## XML Axis Properties

- [XML Axis Properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-axis/index.md): Learn more about: XML Axis Properties (Visual Basic)
- [XML Attribute Axis Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-axis/xml-attribute-axis-property.md): Learn more about: XML Attribute Axis Property (Visual Basic)
- [XML Child Axis Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-axis/xml-child-axis-property.md): Learn more about: XML Child Axis Property (Visual Basic)
- [XML Descendant Axis Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-axis/xml-descendant-axis-property.md): Learn more about: XML Descendant Axis Property (Visual Basic)
- [Extension Indexer Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-axis/extension-indexer-property.md): Learn more about: Extension Indexer Property (Visual Basic)
- [XML Value Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-axis/xml-value-property.md): Learn more about: XML Value Property (Visual Basic)
